original_title: As Aventuras de Dom Quixota e Sam Chupão
overview: After the destruction of El Maurinho in Inglourious Whiskers II, the then Dom Quixota II manages to become president taking Sam Chupão to look for a new male princess who was worthy to become Dom Quixota III. In his search, Sam Chupão meets the dying man who lived there at the entrance of the city of "Nhaca Tatu Von Dia" and after a lovely romantic dinner between the two, Sam Chupão asked the dying to become the new Don Quixote III .
title: As Aventuras de Dom Quixota e Sam Chupão
